EmailTemplate.name: Gated Content: 2021_04_RET_SCOGeneral.05-24-2021 RET SCO Campaign NAMER List + W
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You & your webinar slides are here
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Thank you for registering for our “Data-driven store transformation” webinar. You can access the presentation here. <[[https://www.ncr.com/content/dam/web/documents/NAMER_Webinar_19_05_21.pdf?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2021_SCOGeneral_Retail&utm_content=Email3&utm_industry=retail&utm_sub-industry=SCO]]> If you attended the session, we hope you saw the tremendous value within your store’s data and are curious to see how NCR’s Retail Transformation Practice <[[https://www.ncr.com/global-services/professional-services/professional-services-for-retail?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2021_SCOGeneral_Retail&utm_content=Email3a&utm_industry=retail&utm_sub-industry=SCO]]> can help you find the right data to innovate, gain better efficiency and have happy customers. If you weren’t able to join don’t worry, the details are all in the presentation. Either way, drop us a line and we’ll set up a date to explore options to refresh your front-end and deliver a better customer experience. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
